Inglewood.Los Angeles International Airport: Los Angeles International Airport (IATA: LAX, ICAO: KLAX, FAA LID: LAX) is the primary international airport serving Los Angeles City. It is the largest and busiest airport in both the Los Angeles metropolitan area and in the state of California, second busiest airport in the United States, and one of the largest international airports in the US and the world. The airport is most often referred to by its IATA airport code (and FAA LID) LAX, with the letters pronounced individually.
